attributes.action: afford the late Henry Allingham a nation's tribute in the form of a ceremonial funeral
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the passing of the late henry allingham should be celebrated by our nation in tribute to the selflessness, courage and sense of duty epitomised by men such as he.

many honours have been awarded to him in life, now let this entire nation show him and his fellows how much we mourn his passing.

This celebration of a life lived to the highest standards will send a message to the wider services family just how much this nation owes to them, how much we value their efforts in our name.

rejection.details: Henry Allingham will receive a public funeral with military honours.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
